description:
11.191 photosensitivity
Reduce various flashes in video, so to help users with epilepsy.

It accepts the following options:
name: photosensitivity

parameters.description: Set how many frames to use when filtering. Default is 30.
parameters.name: frames, f

parameters.description: Set detection threshold factor. Default is 1. Lower is stricter.
parameters.name: threshold, t

parameters.description: Set how many pixels to skip when sampling frames. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 1024.
parameters.name: skip

source:
11.191 photosensitivity

Reduce various flashes in video, so to help users with epilepsy.

It accepts the following options:

frames, f

Set how many frames to use when filtering. Default is 30.

threshold, t

Set detection threshold factor. Default is 1. Lower is stricter.

skip

Set how many pixels to skip when sampling frames. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 1024.

bypass

Leave frames unchanged. Default is disabled.
